applyForCredit(uint256,uint256,uint256,b.return: credit Return credit address. The function publishes another contract which is the credit contract. The owner of the new contract is the present contract.

changeCreditState(address,uint8).details: Function to switch active state of a credit.

getCredits().details: Get the list with all credits.
getCredits().return: credits Returns list of credit addresses.

setFraudStatus(address).return: users[_borrower].fraudStatus Boolean of the new fraud status.

toggleCreditActiveState(address).details: Function to toggle active state of credit contract.
